text: Bornem is a municipality in the Belgian province of Antwerp. It includes the towns of Hingene, Mariekerke, Weert and Bornem proper. There are also the hamlets of Branst, Buitenland, Eikevliet and Wintam. In 2007, 20235 people lived there. It is at 51° 05 North, 04° 14 East. == References == Category:Municipalities of Antwerp
title: Bornem
